</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instdeleterirstrategy">InstDeleterIRStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy that deletes instructions when the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> is too large. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instdeleterirstrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instmodificationirstrategy">InstModificationIRStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy that modifies instruction attributes and operands. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instmodificationirstrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertfunctionstrategy">InsertFunctionStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy that generates new function calls and inserts function signatures to the modules. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertfunctionstrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertcfgstrategy">InsertCFGStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy to split a random block and insert a random CFG in between. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertcfgstrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertphistrategy">InsertPHIStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy to insert PHI Nodes at the head of each basic block. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertphistrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sinkinstructionstrategy">SinkInstructionStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy to select a random instruction and add a new sink (user) to it to increate data dependency. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sinkinstructionstrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shuffleblockstrategy">ShuffleBlockStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy to randomly select a block and shuffle the operations without affecting data dependency. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shuffleblockstrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// configurable set of strategies. Some common strategies are also included</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Provide a weight to bias towards choosing this strategy for a mutation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The value of the weight is arbitrary, but a good default is &quot;the number of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// distinct ways in which this strategy can mutate a unit&quot;. This can also be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// used to prefer strategies that shrink the overall size of the result when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// we start getting close to \\c MaxSize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Fuzzer friendly interface for the llvm bitcode parser.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param Data Bitcode we are going to parse</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param Size Size of the &#39;Data&#39; in bytes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return New module or nullptr in case of error</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    LLVMContext &amp;Context);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Fuzzer friendly interface for the llvm bitcode printer.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param M Module to print</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param MaxSize Size of the destination buffer</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">///         returns 0 and leaves Dest unchanged.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
